thread.title: You Can Now Get Your Favorite NYX Lipstick For 40 Percent Off - but There's a Catch
thread.title_full: You Can Now Get Your Favorite NYX Lipstick For 40 Percent Off - but There's a Catch

author: Perri Konecky
title: You Can Now Get Your Favorite NYX Lipstick For 40 Percent Off - but There's a Catch
text:
NYX Cosmetics Lippies Sale | February 2017 You Can Now Get Your Favorite NYX Lipstick For 40 Percent Off â€” but There's a Catch February 14, 2017 by Perri Konecky 433 Shares A post shared by NYX Professional Makeup (@nyxcosmetics) on Feb 14, 2017 at 10:20am PST 
There are very few things in life that excite us quite like a good sale, and NYX Cosmetics' latest deal just took our excitement to a whole new level. The brand announced that starting Feb. 14, all lip products are 40 percent off at NYX Professional Makeup stores and on the company's website . Yup: all of the amazing, affordable lip products just got even more affordable. 
That means you can score the brand-new Pin-Up Pout Lipstick for just $4.80. You can also get all the NYX classics like the Soft Matte Lipstick and the Lip Lingerie liquid lipstick at a discounted price. The catch? There is a limit of five per item per customer, so keep your hoarding to a minimum. The sale will end on Feb. 17 or until supplies last, so fill up those carts, stat! Related:
